Quizlet:
*that*
adjective: what
conjunction: that, than
pronoun: what, that

"¿Qué quieres hacer hoy?" - What do you want to do today?

*of*
preposition: of, from, by
conjunction: than
adverb: off

Él es el dueño de la casa. He is the owner of the house.

*No*
particle: not, no, nay

No puedo ir contigo. - I cannot go with you.

*to*
preposition: to, at, of

"Ella está a punto de salir." - She is about to leave.

*the*
article: the
noun: la, A
pronoun: her, it, you

La casa es muy grande. - The house is very big.

*he*
article: the

El chico está comiendo una manzana. - The boy is eating an apple.

*is*
phrase: this is, you are

"Es una pregunta difícil." - It is a difficult question.

*and*
conjunction: and

"Y yo quiero un helado." - And I want an ice cream.

*in*
preposition: in, on, at

"Vamos a pasear en el parque." - Let's go for a walk in the park.

*it*
article: the
pronoun: it, him, to it

"Lo siento mucho." - I'm very sorry.

*a*
article: a, an
adjective: one

"Tengo una pregunta." - I have a question.

*by*
preposition: by, for, per

Por favor, ayúdame. - Please, help me.

*that*
adjective: what
adverb: what

"¿Qué tal?" - What's up?

*I*
pronoun: me, myself

Me gusta cantar.  I like to sing.

*a*
article: a, an
adjective: one

Una vez más, uno debe tener cuidado. - Once again, one must be careful.

*tea*
pronoun: you, thee, yourself

"Te quiero mucho" - I love you very much.

*the*
article: the
pronoun: them

Los alumnos están aprendiendo mucho. - The students are learning a lot.

*HE*
pronoun: oneself, self
abbreviation: o.s.

Se desvaneció rápidamente. - It disappeared quickly.

*with*
preposition: with, by, cum

"Ella habla con su hermano." - She speaks with her brother.

*for*
preposition: for, to, of
conjunction: in order to, so as to

"Para tener éxito, necesitas trabajar duro." - In order to be successful, you need to work hard.

*my*
pronoun: my, myself
noun: mi, E

"Mi casa es grande." - My house is big.

*is*
adjective: this
pronoun: this one

"Está lloviendo." - It is raining.

*Yeah*
noun: si, B
conjunction: once, supposing

Si pudiera, lo haría. - If I could, I would.

*good*
adjective: well, nice
adverb: well, good, right
noun: good, right, sake

"Todo está bien." - Everything is good.

*but*
conjunction: but, only
noun: but

"Pero él no quiere ir al cine", But he doesn't want to go to the movies.

*I*
pronoun: I
noun: self

Yo quiero comer. - I want to eat.

pronoun: that, it

Eso es fácil de decir. - That is easy to say.

*the*
article: the
pronoun: them

*Yeah*

particle: yes, yeah, yea
pronoun: himself, herself, oneself
abbreviation: o.s.

preposition: to the, at the
